simulation

Class XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • simulation.XML
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class XML
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    XML class, where the parsing of the XML file is done and the values needed are read from the file, while checking for errors in the input, either related to the way the file is written or with the permitted values.
    Author:
    Miguel Rodrigues, nr 76176, Afonso Soares, nr 81086

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean bcostzone
      Boolean value to indicate there's a value to be read after the zone's attributes

      Counter for the number of obstacles in the XML file

      Counter for the number of special cost zones in the XML file

      Instance of the simulation to be used

      X coordinate of the final point of a zone

                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
